job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>Blackstone Talent Group, an award-winning technology consulting and talent agency is seeking a Senior Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) to join our client in a 100% remote opportunity!</p><p><br></p><p>Looking for AWS or GCP experience and a background in back-end development. Some of the opportunity highlights;</p><p><br></p><p>• Worldwide market leader</p><p>• Will be building out and supporting new product lines</p><p>• 100% Remote</p><p>• Full time, permanent/direct hire opportunity</p><p><br></p><p>Sr. SRE will be building out &amp; supporting new product lines that collect analytics/data from retail locations across the globe.</p><p><br></p><p>Ideal Candidate will have the following:</p><ul><li>5+ years SRE experience</li><li>Strong Backend dev experience</li><li>Strong AWS or GCP experience </li><li>Experience with Kanban</li><li>Python, GO or Terraform experience</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Work in an environment where you can focus on big problems. Low on meetings and overhead. We are a community of makers and we want people with the same mindset. Focused on building great solutions to the problems our customers face.</p>
